page.title: 08NEW BUILDINGS IN WOODHOUSE
page.content: { Our school was built in 1845 and is {one of the oldest public buildings in {Mansfield Woodhouse.}Next door is one of the newest,{The Woodhouse Centre. This consists mainly of the{Co-op {Superstore}which opened in the autumn of 1984. Before it was built there was considerable opposition to the development on{environmental grounds. The store was not only to be in the centre of the town but also in the middle of a{Conservation Area.}The{Old {Mansfield Woodhouse Society}played a great part in the debate and although the development went ahead it has been skillfully blended into the area.Most people now see the Centre as an asset to the town.The Centre includes{8 shop {units, Building Society/Estate Agents {officies and T.S.B.bank.}The{Angel Inn was extended and all were{limestone faced. Class 4 S.E.
